05-73370 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 0078702 |footnotes =
|website = }} 'Washington' is a city in Hempstead County, Arkansas, United
States. The population was 148 at the 2000 census. It is part of the Hope
Micropolitan Statistical Area.
